item.title: 彼得罗为哥伦比亚宪法重修制定长远计划
item.description: 古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）总统正试图为他修改哥伦比亚宪法的努力争取民众的支持，但由于立法和司法方面的障碍，这一努力成功的几率很小。【原文：President Gustavo Petro is trying to build popular support for his bid to overhaul Colombia’s constitution, which faces long odds of success given legislative and judicial hurdles.】

item.title: 霸菱在转型期暂停私人信贷投资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一封客户信称，霸菱有限责任公司（Barings LLC）正在暂停对其私人信贷基金进行新的投资，同时这些基金正在向新的领导层过渡，在此之前，已有 20 多名员工离职，转投新贵科林西亚全球管理公司（Corinthia Global Management）。【原文：Barings LLC is pausing making new investments across its private credit funds while they transition to new leadership, according to a client letter seen by Bloomberg News, after over 20 employees left for upstart Corinthia Global Management.】

item.title: 国际清算银行的卡斯滕斯说：央行不应过早欢呼胜利
英国《金融时报》称，德勤为在严峻市场中削减成本进行结构调整
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，德勤正在寻求彻底改革其结构，因为这家专业服务公司希望在市场放缓之前削减成本。【原文：Deloitte is looking to overhaul its structure as the professional services firm looks to cut costs ahead of a market slowdown, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 高盛向 Tishman Speyer 出售泽西市海滨地块
item.description: Tishman Speyer 从高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Tishman Speyer bought land beneath apartments it’s developing on the Jersey City waterfront, from Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 最炙手可热的商品从五张图表看可可的历史性飙升
item.description: 由于担心可可短缺，可可价格几乎每天都创出新高，可可的破纪录增长没有放缓的迹象。【原文：Cocoa’s record-breaking run shows no sign of slowing as fears over shortages send prices to new highs on an almost daily basis.】

item.title: 两艘装载俄罗斯乌拉尔石油的油轮在印度附近海域闲置数周
item.description: 两艘载有俄罗斯旗舰产品乌拉尔原油的油轮在印度西海岸闲置了三个多星期，没有任何迹象表明它们将在何时卸货。【原文：Two tankers carrying Russian flagship Urals crude have been idling off the West Coast of India for more than three weeks without any indication of when they will unload.】

item.title: 路易斯安那天然气项目在能源转让公司与开发商的争执中推迟
item.description: 由于 Energy Transfer LP 与竞争对手天然气项目开发商之间的法律纠纷，路易斯安那州的一条输气管道被推迟。【原文：A Louisiana pipeline has been delayed as a legal battle rages between Energy Transfer LP and rival natural gas project developers.】

item.title: 美联储掉期价格显示 6 月降息概率不足 50
item.description: 债券交易商继续下调对美联储今年降息的预期，不再认为 6 月份降息的可能性更大。【原文：Bond traders continue to lower their expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year and no longer consider a June rate cut likelier than not.】

item.title: 领导层变动导致泰卢固大跌
item.description: 液化天然气出口开发商泰卢瑞安公司（Tellurian Inc.【原文：LNG export developer Tellurian Inc. shares dropped as much as 25% Monday, the most since November, after announcing that it appointed a new president of its company assets, while its CEO Octávio Simões moves into an advisory role ahead of his previously-announced June retirement.】

item.title: 分解阿联酋在埃及 350 亿美元的巨额投资
item.description:
该协议对广大中东地区意味着什么？【原文：

What the deal means for the wider Middle East.

】

item.title: Moelis 私募基金咨询主管罗德尼-里德离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Moelis & Co. 私募基金顾问全球主管罗德尼-里德（Rodney Reid）即将离职。【原文：Moelis & Co.’s global head of private-funds advisory, Rodney Reid, is leaving the firm, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 银行在行业动荡中吹嘘自己 "无聊 "了一年
item.description: 在经历了动荡的一年后，银行正在寻找一种投资者和客户很少见到的企业自称方式：乏味。【原文：After a tumultuous year, banks are looking to be something investors and customers rarely see companies call themselves: boring.】

item.title: Signa 债权人支持重组计划，承诺 30% 的赔付率
item.description: Signa Prime Selection AG 的债权人支持这家资不抵债的房地产公司提出的有序出售数十亿欧元豪宅的建议，从而拉开了重组的序幕，预计两年内至少可收回 30% 的资金。【原文：Creditors of Signa Prime Selection AG backed a proposal by the insolvent real estate company for the orderly sale of billions of euros of luxury properties, kicking off a restructuring that’s expected to recoup at least 30% of their money over two years.】

item.title: 大型银行为何抵制更大的 "资本缓冲"？
item.description: 美国监管机构去年夏天提出了新规定，要求银行增加数十亿美元的所谓资本缓冲，以便在经济下滑时提供保护。最大的银行将承受最沉重的负担，它们必须将资本水平提高约 19%。这些规定源于 2008 年的金融危机，是在 2023 年四家中型银行倒闭后不久出台的。行业组织对该计划展开了激烈的游说活动，认为这将使他们的资本水平降低【原文：US regulators proposed new rules last summer requiring banks to add billions of dollars to their so-called capital cushions, which offer protection during downturns. The heaviest burdens would fall on the biggest banks, which would have to boost their capital levels by about 19%. The rules stem from the 2008 financial crisis and came out soon after the 2023 collapse of four midsize banks. Industry groups have waged a fierce lobbying campaign against the plan, arguing that it would make them less】

item.title: 沙特邀请美林公司成为阿美石油公司的首个外国做市商
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯证券交易所批准美林 KSA 在石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）的股票上进行做市活动，使其成为在沙特阿拉伯王国从事此类业务的首家国际银行。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s stock exchange approved Merrill Lynch KSA to conduct market-making activities on oil giant Aramco’s shares, making it the first international bank to engage in such operations in the kingdom.】

item.title: 埃克森公司称无意在雪佛龙争端中收购赫斯公司
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）的老板周一表示，尽管雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：The boss of Exxon Mobil Corp. said Monday that it has no interest in buying Hess Corp. outright, despite taking Chevron Corp. to arbitration over its proposed $52 billion merger with the other company.】

item.title: 改变黑客攻击后，联合健康向医生和医院发送了 20 亿美元的资金
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. said it advanced more than $2 billion to medical providers after a cyberattack on the company’s Change Healthcare subsidiary last month halted billions of dollars in medical payments.】

item.title: 联合国支持的报告警告加沙北部即将发生饥荒
item.description: 联合国警告说，加沙北部可能出现饥荒，因为该地区一半人口已经面临 "危机水平的粮食不安全或更糟的情况"。【原文：The possibility of a famine looms over northern Gaza as half the population of the area already faces “crisis levels of food insecurity or worse,” the United Nations warned.】

item.title: 世界银行将向埃及提供超过 60 亿美元的支持
item.description: 世界银行周一表示，计划在未来三年内向埃及提供超过 60 亿美元的支持，这是世界银行为支撑这个北非国家的经济所做的最新努力。【原文：The World Bank said Monday it plans on providing more than $6 billion in support to Egypt over the coming three years, marking the latest effort to shore up the North African nation’s economy.】

item.title: 奈拉前景光明，采取措施稳定汇率
item.description: 尼日利亚为稳定本国货币而进行的长期斗争终于取得了成果，分析师们现在预测，饱受打击的奈拉可能会在今年年底前大幅反弹。【原文：Nigeria’s prolonged battle to stabilize its currency is finally bearing fruit, with analysts now forecasting the battered naira could rebound sharply before the end of the year.】

item.title: 卢拉在刺激巴西经济增长、提高支持率的努力中激怒了投资者
item.description: 在巴西的总统府内，由于经济发展停滞不前，月复一月地公布着不温不火的增长数据，人们的焦虑与日俱增。总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦正在向他的高级助手们施加更大的压力，要求他们增加开支，加快经济增长，扭转支持率不断下滑的局面。【原文：Inside Brazil’s presidential palace, angst is mounting as the economy sputters along, churning out tepid growth figures month after month. President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva is ratcheting up the pressure on his top aides to boost spending, gin up faster growth and turn around his sinking approval ratings.】

item.title: 监控：人工智能遮蔽了太阳：英伟达首席执行官让鲍威尔黯然失色
item.description:
eToro的莱德勒表示，本周吸引眼球的是芯片制造商，而非美联储

。【原文：

It’s the chipmaker, not the Fed, grabbing attention this week, eToro’s Laidler says

】

item.title: 通用电气 870 亿美元股价暴利威胁分拆收益
item.description: 通用电气公司（General Electric Co.）的股价已飙升至六年多来的新高，价值增加了约 870 亿美元，因为投资者押注该公司的第二次也是最后一次分拆将为投资者带来福音。但是，进一步的上涨可能很难找到。【原文：General Electric Co. shares have powered to a more than six-year high, adding some $87 billion in value on bets that the company’s second and final spinoff will deliver a boon for investors. But, further gains may be tough to find.】

item.title: 电动汽车革命停滞不前，老牌汽车公司股票再度炙手可热
item.description: 至少在投资者眼中，三巨头又回来了。【原文：The Big Three are back, at least in the eyes of investors.】

item.title: 雷蒙德-詹姆斯认为信用问题依然存在，将 NYCB 的评级下调至 "卖出"。
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的资本注入和信用评级上调并不足以让雷蒙德-詹姆斯（Raymond James）相信，这家陷入困境的贷款机构将很快摆脱困境。【原文：A capital infusion and credit rating hike at New York Community Bancorp were not enough to convince Raymond James that the embattled lender will get beyond its challenges any time soon.】

item.title: 华尔街银行发掘欧洲活跃的债券市场
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase & Co. are piling into Europe’s bond market to raise money, the first Wall Street banks to do so this year as they take advantage of strong funding conditions.】

item.title: 冰岛财政部长要求禁止冰岛银行收购 TM 公司
item.description: 冰岛财政部长表示，她将努力阻止国有银行 Landsbankinn hf 收购一家保险公司，因为这与政府政策相悖。【原文：Iceland’s finance minister said she will try to prevent state-owned lender Landsbankinn hf’s purchase of an insurance company as it contradicts government policy.】

item.title: 霸菱起诉 Corinthia 和 Ian Fowler 私人信贷叛逃案
item.description: 投资管理公司霸菱（Barings）起诉了科林西亚全球管理公司（Corinthia Global Management）以及前员工伊恩-福勒（Ian Fowler）和凯尔西-塔克（Kelsey Tucker），因为这家新成立的私人信贷公司在另类资产管理公司近年来最大规模的团队重组中挖走了 20 多名员工。【原文：Investment manager Barings sued Corinthia Global Management and former employees Ian Fowler and Kelsey Tucker after the upstart private credit firm poached more than 20 employees in one of the largest team lifts at an alternative asset manager in recent years.】

item.title: 高盛因移民问题上调美国 2024 年 GDP 增长和就业预测
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has raised its projections for US economic and jobs growth for this year to account for a faster pace of immigration.】
